      • createProject

        void createProject(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String description,
                   java.time.LocalDate date,
                   int reminderDate,
                   boolean isCheckedGoogle)
            throws NavigationException
        Create a project with all information filled by user, if all required information are given. Otherwise an error message is shown to the user. Once a project is correctly created, it is added to the database.
        Parameters:
        name - project name
        description - project description
        date - project end date
        Throws:
        NavigationException

      • updateProject

                   java.lang.String description,
                   java.time.LocalDate date,
                   int reminderValue)
            throws NavigationException
        Update information of a project in the database. Once information has been updated, go back to the main page.
        Parameters:
        name - project name
        description - project description
        date - project end date
        Throws:
        NavigationException
